info.name: Quarkino-Task
info.description: This API collection showcases a simulated online shopping process, designed to demonstrate my skills following an interview with **Quarkino** Company. The collection comprises five distinct APIs that collectively replicate various stages of an online shopping experience. These APIs interact seamlessly to provide a comprehensive overview of the process, from user authentication to order placement. [GitHub Link](https://github.com/danialzash/quarkino-task)

request.description: Login api, send name and password, the response set access_token cookie of the user or get 401 Unauthorized status
Show list of available products. Each time 15 response can be seen.

response.name: localhost/api/products?page=2

request.description: Create order with product id and requested quantity
This api send current user to payment IPG to pay for order 1.
Api which is send from IPG to show payment has been successful. order_id and the cost which user paid are query params.
